alert.note: Alert for Weston (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 1:11AM MDT until June 27 at 2:15AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Custer County in southwestern South Dakota... Southeastern Weston County in northeastern Wyoming... * Until 215 AM MDT. * At 110 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles northeast of Morrisey, or 18 miles south of Newcastle, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Dewey, Argyle, Jewel Cave National Monument and Elk Mountain Lookout. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
